text: 22:7 Ua Me Ini 20:12; 22:21-22; Godɨn Araziba 5:16; 24:17Ian aven itir gumazitam tong deravɨra uan ameboghfeziabar akaba baragha men apengan itir puvatɨ. Kantrin igharazibar gumazamizir ian tongɨn itiba ia me abɨri. Egha ian tongɨn itir amizir odiarir paba ovengeziba, ko ameboghfeziaba ariaghirezir boriba, ia men biziba isa pazavɨra me gami.
